channel.title: Maine on a personal blog
channel.description: Recent content in Maine on a personal blog

item.title: Common Ground
item.description: Another fair has come and gone. There was once a time where we lazily strolled through Common Ground, treating it like so many other country fairs. Once we discovered the lectures on homestaeding and slow living, we started running manic circles through Unity looking for the next best talk. When kids came along, we continued to try to run laps through, trading responsibility for the little ones while we collected ideas to bring home.
